original_text: As also in all his epistles, speaking in them of these things; in which are some things hard to be understood, which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest, as they do also the other scriptures, unto their own destruction.
korean_text: 또 그 모든 편지에도 이런 일에 관하여 말하였으되 그 중에 알기 어려운 것이 더러 있으니 무식한 자들과 굳세지 못한 자들이 다른 성경과 같이 그것도 억지로 풀다가 스스로 멸망에 이르느니라

sentences.original_text: As also in all his epistles
speaking in them of these things
in which are some things hard to be understood
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에는 이해하기 어려운 것들이 있으며

sentences.original_text: which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest
sentences.korean_translation: 배우지 못하고 불안정한 자들이 비틀거리는 것들

sentences.original_text: as they do also the other scriptures
